"Hounyan": "...Wait. Your Class isn't Force, is it?"
"If you want to learn how to fight, please go to the Class Counter and change your Class to Force."
"Be sure to also learn some Force Class Skills."
"Well, perhaps I should explain it a little first."
"Force is a Class that uses Techniques to attack enemies from a distance."
"Core to its fighting style is its ability to target enemy Attribute Weaknesses."
"Its Class Skills can increase the amount of Photons you can store in your body, or speed up your Photon recovery once they are consumed."

"As a beginner...
You may wish to get used to using \"Photon Flare\" first."
"I will assign you a training task. Use it to try out what I've taught you."
